title: Close encounters of the sexual kind (Captioned)
brief_description: Sequel to “Contraception: ready or not” addressing myths, facts and attitudes towards sexually transmitted diseases. Designed to encourage a responsible attitude towards sex and contraception and the prevention of STD’s. The issues raised include AIDS, the need for medical check-ups, communication and condoms.
